name: Hot Potato (itch) (Zephyr Dreams)
description:
***** A small game for the 3rd Blackthornprod Game Jam *****

Theme: Less is More

The idea is not to be the potato (less) which is how you win the game (more!)

Be the last man standing as the curse of the hot potato is passed back and forth until someone explodes.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

A & D - Move

ENTER - Shoot

SPACE - Jump
